moa.classifiers

Interface Ensemble

  • All Superinterfaces:
    moa.gui.AWTRenderable, moa.classifiers.Classifier, moa.MOAObject, moa.options.OptionHandler, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEnsemble, OnlineBagging

    public interface Ensemble
extends moa.classifiers.Classifier
    Ensemble interface for incremental classification models.
    Author:
    Luis H. P. Mendes (luishpmendes@gmail.com)

      • trainOnInstance

        void trainOnInstance(weka.core.Instance inst,
                   double lambda)
        Trains this classifier incrementally using the given instance.
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance to be used for training
        lambda - parameter used to encourage more or less diversity
